content: Yes, I'm aware of the upcoming Flow hackathon! The Flow Open Worlds hackathon will take place from March 15 to April 11, 2022. The hackathon is organized by Dapper Labs and is focused on building open worlds and games on the Flow blockchain. There will be over $1 million in prizes, as well as mentorship and support from industry experts. The hackathon is a great opportunity to explore new ideas, connect with other developers, and showcase your skills. You can find more information and sign up on the Flow Open Worlds website.
